Title: Dick Tracy: The Art of Chester Gould (1978) Exhibition Catalogue
Description: 1978 exhibition catalogue from the Museum of Cartoon Art in Port Chester, NY. Features artwork, essays, and behind-the-scenes material from the legendary comic strip creator. Introduction by Max Allan Collins. Softcover, complete, good condition with some edge wear and loosening binding. A rare piece of comic art history.

Title: Boogeyman 2 DVD – Unrated Director's Cut (2007)
Description: Boogeyman 2 – Unrated Director's Cut on DVD. Starring Tobin Bell and Danielle Savre. When a young woman checks into a mental health facility to confront her childhood fear of the Boogeyman, she discovers the other patients are being killed off one by one. Format: DVD. Condition: Good/VG.

Title: Phantasm DVD – Anchor Bay Collection (1979)
Description: Phantasm on DVD – Anchor Bay Collection edition. Directed by Don Coscarelli. A teenage boy and his friends face off against a mysterious grave-robbing mortician known as the Tall Man, who guards a gateway to a hostile alien world. Format: DVD. Condition: Good/VG.

Title: 4 Movie Collection – Hollywood Hits (Hostel, Hostel Part II, The Tattooist, The Hunt for the BTK Killer)
Description: 4 Movie Collection – Hollywood Hits DVD. Includes Hostel (2005), Hostel Part II (2007), The Tattooist (2007), and The Hunt for the BTK Killer (2005). Four intense thrillers in one set. Format: DVD. Condition: Good/VG.

Title: Bad to the Bone – 4 Movies DVD
Description: Bad to the Bone – 4 Movies on one DVD. A collection of action and thriller films featuring memorable villains and anti-heroes. Great value multi-pack for movie night. Format: DVD. Condition: Good/VG.

Title: Movie Rule #105 – Bad Guys Bite the Dust (9 Movies)
Description: Movie Rule #105 – Bad Guys Bite the Dust. Nine action films on DVD: Con Games, The Eliminator, Men with Guns, Tunnel Vision, Tusks, Airborne, Forever Mine, Street Corner Justice, and Seduced. Over 13 hours of entertainment. Format: DVD. Condition: Good/VG.
